data.message: Facebook i report a many posts which hace a very bad abuses but u r not delete them

replies.message: Hi,  Hassan. Because of the diversity of our community, it's possible that something could be disagreeable or disturbing to you without meeting the criteria for being removed or blocked. For this reason, we offer personal controls over what you see, such as the ability to hide or quietly cut ties with people, Pages, or applications that offend you. Facebook also offers tools to help you deal with bullying and harassment. Learn more at: http://bit.ly/2cUWN5s. -Rhea
